NC.Q: Between the flows from node Entrance Exams to node Gap Year and from node Direct Admission to node Entrepreneurship, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Counseling to node Online Applications, from node Exchange Programs to node Gap Year, and from node Financial Aid to node Direct Admission, which path has the largest flow?
